CSVIndexReader - Class in src.java.index
This implementation of IndexReader reads an InvertedIndex object from the disk, with a format similar to CSV.
Example: term, documentId:DocumentFrequency,documentId:DocumentFrequency, ...

CSVIndexWriter - Class in src.java.index
This implementation of IndexWriter writes an InvertedIndex object on disk, with a format similar to CSV.
Example: term, documentId:DocumentFrequency,documentId:DocumentFrequency, ...

CTStemmingIndexerBuilder - Class in src.java.indexer.indexerbuilders
